name: Logo
description: Design a unique and memorable primary logo that reflects the core values and vision of your brand. This includes several initial concepts, refinements, and finalization to ensure it fits your brand strategy perfectly.

name: Color Palette
description: Develop a comprehensive custom color palette that covers primary, secondary, and neutral colors. This palette ensures consistent color usage across all brand touchpoints for maximum recognition and impact.

name: Typography
description: Carefully select brand typography including fonts, weights, and hierarchy to create consistent, readable, and attractive text styles that support the brand’s personality and usability.

name: 3D Mockups
description: Create realistic 3D mockups showing the logo applied in various environments and products to help visualize the brand presence in real-world contexts, useful for presentations and marketing materials.

name: Favicon Design
description: Design a small but effective favicon version of the logo optimized specifically for browser tabs, ensuring your brand stands out even in small-scale digital spaces.

name: Brand Guidelines
description: Compile a detailed PDF document outlining the proper usage of the logo, color schemes, typography, spacing, and other brand elements to maintain consistency across all marketing and communication channels.

name: Color Variations (Full Color, Solid Black, Solid White)
description: Prepare multiple color variations of your logo including full color, solid black, and solid white versions to ensure flexibility for use across different backgrounds and mediums.

name: Logo Formats
description: Export the logo in various formats such as SVG, PNG, PDF, and EPS to cover all digital and print needs, ensuring high-quality and scalability.

name: Monochrome Versions
description: Provide one-color versions of your logo suitable for printing limitations, embossing, or situations requiring simplified branding.

name: Responsive Logo Variants
description: Design smaller and simplified logo variants optimized for mobile devices, social media avatars, and other small-scale uses, preserving brand clarity and recognition.

name: Export for Print (CMYK)
description: Create print-ready logo files with CMYK color profiles and appropriate resolution to ensure color accuracy and sharpness on physical materials.

name: Export for Web (RGB)
description: Provide web-optimized logo files in RGB color profile with compression suitable for fast loading and crisp display on digital screens.

name: Social Media Kit
description: Design a complete set of branded assets including profile icons, cover images, and post templates tailored for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn to maintain brand consistency online.

name: Business Card Design
description: Create professional front and back business card layouts featuring the logo, contact information, and brand elements designed to leave a strong impression.

name: Letterhead Design
description: Develop a branded letterhead template suitable for official correspondence, incorporating logo, colors, and typography to maintain professionalism and brand presence.

name: Email Signature
description: Design a clean, branded email footer with logo, contact details, and social media links to reinforce brand identity in everyday communications.

name: Instagram Story Templates
description: Create reusable, visually engaging branded templates for Instagram stories to support consistent messaging and style in social campaigns.

name: Highlight Covers
description: Design matching highlight cover icons for Instagram to organize stories visually while maintaining brand aesthetics.

name: Brand Discovery Workshop
description: Conduct one-on-one sessions or detailed questionnaires to explore your brand’s vision, target audience, and goals, laying a solid foundation for the entire branding process.

name: Competitor Analysis
description: Research and analyze direct competitors in your market to identify opportunities for differentiation and strategic positioning.

name: Brand Voice / Messaging Guidelines
description: Develop clear guidelines defining the tone of voice, taglines, and communication rules to ensure consistent brand messaging across all channels and content.

name: Landing Page
description: Design a fully responsive landing page including a hero section, contact form, and two additional client-selected sections (such as testimonials, statistics, promotions) optimized for mobile and desktop devices.

name: 404 Page Design
description: Create a custom branded error page to improve user experience and guide visitors back to key site areas when they encounter broken links.

name: User Page
description: Develop user account pages including login, signup, cart, and purchase history to provide a seamless and secure user experience.

name: Website Payment Integration
description: Integrate secure and reliable payment gateway solutions to facilitate online transactions directly on the website.

name: Integrating AI Helper into the Website
description: Implement a custom AI chatbot or assistant on the website to enhance user support and engagement through intelligent, real-time interactions.

name: Blog Setup or CMS Integration
description: Set up a blog or content management system allowing easy content updates, structured publishing, and SEO-friendly layouts.

name: SEO Metadata + Sitemap
description: Optimize page titles, meta descriptions, and generate sitemaps to improve search engine indexing and website visibility.

name: GDPR / Cookie Consent Banner
description: Add legally compliant consent banners to the website ensuring adherence to EU privacy regulations and building trust with visitors.

name: Newsletter Signup Integration
description: Connect email marketing tools like Mailchimp for lead generation through signup forms and subscription management.

name: Website Maintenance for One Year
description: Provide comprehensive website hosting, domain management, updates, backups, and ongoing technical support to keep the site running smoothly and securely for a full year.

name: Mockup Presentation
description: Prepare a professional presentation in PDF or slide format showcasing the logo and branding applications across multiple media to help clients visualize their brand in action.

name: Revisions (x2 rounds)
description: Include two rounds of client revisions to gather feedback and make refinements ensuring the final deliverables meet expectations.

name: Website Training Session
description: Conduct a detailed training session to teach clients how to use and manage their website backend effectively, empowering independence in content updates and management.
